lead_paragraph: Ready or not, Panasonic has just unwrapped a consumer camcorder that enables you to capture video in 3-D. But you'll still need the glasses, and a 3-D TV, to view your videos in the third dimension.
snippet: Panasonic now makes a 3D camcorder for consumers.

headline.main: The Third Dimension, in a Panasonic Camcorder

abstract: Panasonic now makes a 3D camcorder for consumers.
